title: Trump Hosts Controversial $TRUMP Memecoin Crypto Dinner
summary: Trump hosted a high-profile cryptocurrency dinner at his National Golf Club, with guest list revealing significant foreign national attendance and potential regulatory conflicts. 73% of top attendees are foreign nationals, including Justin Sun, a crypto entrepreneur currently facing SEC fraud lawsuits. The dinner, costing over $1 million per seat, has prompted investigations from Congressional Democrats including Representatives Casten, Smith, and Raskin.
